sentence: View host/CNN commentator Ana Navarro attended, as well as North Carolina Congressman Madison Cawthorn.
author: Abram Brown
title: Poolside Fundraisers, Crypto And Mini-Trumps: Inside Peter Thiel's Life After Facebook

sentence: Almost everyone had expected Moore to run in the 13th District under the map that has since been struck down, but he decided not to after Rep. Madison Cawthorn surprised everyone by announcing he'd run for that constituency rather than the neighboring 14th.
title: Morning Digest: Longtime Democratic power player on Long Island will not seek
